author: James Tanner
method: Place the miso paste, water, chilli, garlic, bay leaf and ginger into a saucepan, bring to the boil and stir to combine.  Add the noodles to the pan and simmer for 2-3 minutes, or until softened. Add the pak choi leaves to the pan and cook for 1-2 minutes.  To serve, pour the soup into a serving bowl and garnish with fresh coriander.
ingredients: 1 tbsp miso paste,  100ml/3½fl oz boiling water,  ½ red chilli, sliced,  ½ garlic clove, sliced,  1 bay leaf,  ½ tsp ground ginger,  75g/2½oz wholewheat noodles,  1 pak choi, leaves separated,  fresh coriander, to garnish
